attributes.action: Spend Road Tax on repairing roads.
attributes.additional_details: Spend the fortune paid by motorists in vehicle excise duty on road repairs, potholes and proper resurfacing
attributes.background: It is costing insurers and drivers fortunes to repair tyres, wheels and suspensions due to poorly repaired roads. It is time to properly resurface roads & end the constant potholes suffered.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government has already announced the from 2020 VED will be ringfenced for the National Road Fund. You can find out more here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/757950/roads-funding-information-pack.pdf
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
